name: BarkingDogForRoutines
0:
”Alexa, start Barking Dog”
”Alexa, open Barking Dog”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: barking dog
des:
This is a simple dog barking Alexa Skill that's good for use in Alexa Routines. After being invoked, it immediately plays a random barking sound without Alexa saying anything or asking you any question which means you don't have to be near the Alexa-enabled device when the routine begins.

For example, you could set it up so that if your Alexa-compatible security camera detects motion during sleep time at night, Alexa would play a dog barking sound effect via this "Barking Dog For Routines" Alexa skill.

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

1. Enable this "Barking Dog For Routines" Alexa skill.
2. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
3. Click + to add a new routine.
4. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
5. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
6. Choose "Your Skills".
7. Select "Barking Dog For Routines".
8. Click Next.
9. Choose Device to perform the routine to.
10. Click Save.

priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
